text: tame kahi do ke, janavo! Jo allaha ta'ala tamari sambhalavani ane jovani saktine sampurnapane la'i le ane tamara hrdayo para mahora lagavi de, to allaha ta'ala sivaya bijo ko'i pujya che ke e tamane parata api de, tame ju'o to ame kevi rite puravanum alaga-alaga rite varnana kari rahya che, to pana a loko manata nathi
